greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Let d be the list of A000005(n) = tau(n) divisors of n. Then a(n) is the largest k such that Sum_{i=1..#d-k} d_i > n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
formula: a(n) > 0 if and only if n is in A023196.
program: A125747(n) = { my(k=0,s=0); fordiv(n,d, k++; s += d; if(s>=n,return(k))); };
results.author: _David A. Corneth_, Apr 01 2018
